title: UFYB 184: Black & White Thinking
itunes:title: Black & White Thinking
description:
Do you believe that you have to quit your job in order to take any action on starting your dream business? That you can only be happy if you have a very specific kind of life? That you have to cut someone out of your life because they did something you dislike? These are all examples of black and white thinking, one of the most pervasive - and limiting - ways of looking at the world. Tune in to learn how embracing shades of grey will open up your life and expand your impact in the world.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/184

itunes:subtitle: How you might be destroying your chances of long-term fulfillment and happiness.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
